text: @realDonaldTrump NY is turning in next Wuhan .. You need to take hard measure's across United States or else cost will b so high USA will take longer ..much longer time to recover. Lock it down as Our beloved PM Modi Did In India . India is under lock down for 21 days from today. Respect 🙏🇮🇳🇺🇸
